mapper.select: SELECT a.support_no, a.support_category, a.support_title, a.support_writer, DATE_FORMAT(support_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') support_date, a.support_hit, b.category_name FROM tm_support a INNER JOIN tm_support_category b ON a.support_category = b.category_no ORDER BY support_no DESC LIMIT ${page}, 15

SELECT a.support_no, a.support_category, a.support_title, a.support_writer, DATE_FORMAT(support_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') support_date, a.support_hit, b.category_name FROM tm_support a INNER JOIN tm_support_category b ON a.support_category = b.category_no WHERE support_writer = #{id} ORDER BY a.support_no DESC LIMIT ${page}, 15
SELECT COUNT(a.support_no) FROM tm_support a INNER JOIN tm_support_category b ON a.support_category = b.category_no WHERE support_writer = #{id} ORDER BY a.support_no DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE tm_support SET support_hit = support_hit + 1 WHERE support_no = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT a.support_no, a.support_category, a.support_title, a.support_content, a.support_writer, DATE_FORMAT(support_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') support_date, a.support_hit, b.category_name FROM tm_support a INNER JOIN tm_support_category b ON a.support_category = b.category_no WHERE support_no = #{no}
SELECT IFNULL(MAX(support_no), 0) prev FROM tm_support WHERE support_no < #{no}
SELECT IFNULL(MIN(support_no), 0) next FROM tm_support WHERE support_no > #{no}
